query.statement:
SELECT A.POSID_1 AS POSID , A.ZSPEC1, A.ZSPEC2 , A.ZSPEC12, A.TEXT30, INT(A.ZSPEC11) AS FLOOR, SUBSTR(A.ZSPEC2,1,2) AS AUSE , SUBSTR(A.ZSPEC2,1,2) AS AUSE2 , CASE WHEN T.CONTR = 'Y' THEN '내부' WHEN T.CONTR = 'N' THEN '외부' ELSE '' END AS CONTR , VALUE(D.DATE1, '00000000') AS DATE1 , VALUE(D.DATE4, '00000000') AS DATE2 , VALUE(G.KETF1_DATE,'00000000') AS DATE3
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT Z.MANDT, Z.HOGI , VALUE(Z.VALUE, '') AS CONTR FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND SUBSTR(Z.HOGI,1,6) = #PSPID# AND Z.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_EMRLHSCP' AND Z.SEQ = (SELECT MAX(X.SEQ) FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND X.HOGI = Z.HOGI AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = Z.CHARACTERISTIC) ) AS T ON T.MANDT = A.MANDT AND SUBSTR(T.HOGI, 1,6) = A.POSID AND T.HOGI = A.POSID_1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0024 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.POSID = D.PSPID AND A.POSID_1 = D.POSID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0043 AS G ON A.MANDT = G.MANDT AND A.POSID = G.PSPID AND A.POSID_1 = G.POSID AND G.CHK_KIND = 'C' AND G.CHASU = '001'
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID = #PSPID# AND A.TXT04 <> 'C' AND A.ZZGUBUN IN ( '10' , '11', '12', '13', '14', '20')
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
